properties.description: Tucked away on the waterfront, Appledore Library is a small but busy branch that is an important part of the local community. The library is open four days a week offers the full range of library services for adults and children.
properties.title: Appledore Library

properties.description: Braunton Library invites you to enjoy our warm, friendly and welcoming library this winter. We are offering free tea, coffee and free activities e.g. jigsaws, newspapers, adult colouring etc.

properties.description: Open from 20/10/2022. St Brannock's Rooms can be found directly opposite the fire station. The smaller lounge area is warm and welcoming. Friendly faces & a hot drink'
